title: Ralph Fiennes reveals the secret behind his wild dancing in A Bigger Splash
text:
Ralph Fiennes reveals the secret behind his wild dancing in A Bigger Splash 
Irish Examiner Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Ralph Fiennes has revealed the secrets behind his spectacularly enthusiastic dance to the Rolling Stonesâ€™ Emotional Rescue in new movie A Bigger Splash. 
The actor stars as Harry, a record producer who arrives on an Italian island unannounced with his newly-discovered daughter Penelope (Dakota Johnson) in tow. This is a surprise to his rock star ex Marianne (Tilda Swinton), who is recovering from vocal surgery, and her boyfriend Paul (Matthias Schoenaerts). 
...
